summerSchool.title: Grand Union Youth Orchestra Summer School
Tring Park Musical Theatre Summer Course 2019

promotedSchool.heading: World Symposium on Choral Music 2020
promotedSchool.content: Drawing together the leading choirs, conductors, composers and administrators from all over the planet for a superlative experience of concerts, seminars and workshops, the Symposium has also come the Symposium has also come to…read more

promotedSchool.heading: London Youth Coir
promotedSchool.content: The Symposium is for composers keen to see what choirs want and what they can achieve, for choral managers, administrators and accompanists who want to swap ideas with their peers people who just want to consume a varied choral treats.…read more
